User Story: As an entrant, I want to join the waiting list for a specific event
As an entrant, I want to unjoin a waiting list for a specific event
As an entrant, I want to provide my personal information such as name, email and optional phone number in the app
As an entrant I want to update information such as name, email and contact information on my profile
As an entrant I want to upload a profile picture for a more personalized experience
As an entrant I want remove profile picture if need be
As an entrant I want my profile picture to be deterministically generated from my profile name if I haven't uploaded a profile image yet
As an entrant I want to receive notification when chosen from the waiting list (when I "win" the lottery)
As an entrant I want to receive notification of not chosen on the app (when I "lose" the lottery)
As an entrant I want to opt out of receiving notifications from organizers and admin
As an entrant I want another chance to be chosen from the waiting list if a selected user declines an invitation to sign up
As an entrant I want to be able to accept the invitation to register/sign up when chosen to participate in an event
As an entrant I want to be able to decline an invitation when chosen to participate in an event
As an entrant I want to view event details within the app by scanning the promotional QR code
As an entrant I want to be able to be sign up for an event by scanning the QR code
As an entrant, I want to be identified by my device, so that I don't have to use a username and password
As a an organizer I want to create a new event and generate a unique promotional QR code that links to the event description and event poster in the app
As an organizer I want to store hash data of the generated QR code in my database
As an organizer I want to view the list of entrants who joined my event waiting list
As an organizer I want to see on a map where entrants joined my event waiting list from
As an organizer I want to OPTIONALLY limit the number of entrants who can join my waiting list
As an organizer I want to upload an event poster to provide visual information to entrants
As an organizer I want to update an event poster to provide visual information to entrants
As an organizer I want to send a notification to chosen entrants to sign up for events
As an organizer I want to set the system to sample a specified number of attendees to register for the event
As an organizer I want to be able to draw a replacement applicant from the pooling system when a previously selected applicant cancels or rejects the invitation
As an organizer I want to view a list of all chosen entrants who are invited to apply
As an organizer I want to see a list of all the canceled entrants
As an organizer I want to see a final list of entrants who enrolled for the event
As an organizer I want to cancel entrants that declined signing up for the event
As an organizer I want to send notifications to all entrants on the waiting list
As an organizer I want to send notifications to all selected entrants
As an organizer I want to send a notification to all canceled entrants
As an administrator, I want to be able to remove events
As an administrator, I want to be able to remove profiles
As an administrator, I want to be able to remove images
As an administrator, I want to be able to remove hashed QR code data
As an administrator, I want to be able to browse events
As an administrator, I want to be able to browse profiles
As an administrator, I want to be able to browse images
As an administrator I want to remove facilities that violate app policy
